document.full_text: representative joe walsh, a newly elected republican, held his 20th town-hall-style meeting this week, and it offered a lesson in where tea party partisans currently stand.
document.title: chicago news cooperative: a tea party congressman cultivates his base
lines_and_colors: representative joe walsh, a newly elected republican, held his 20th town-hall-style meeting this week, and it offered a lesson in where tea party partisans currently stand.
